description: Wireless communication and sensing systems play an ever increasing role in society. This module introduces the RF and microwave hardware systems and circuits. The applications include: GSM/CDMA, RFID, UWB, WLAN, Bluetooth, Zigbee, Radar and remote sensing
preclusion: EE3104E, TEE3104 Introduction to RF and Microwave Systems & Circuits.
title: Introduction to RF and Microwave Systems & Circuits
